Download H2O Data to Disk

Download an H2O data set to a CSV file on the local disk

h2o.downloadCSV(data, filename)

Arguments

data

an H2OFrame object to be downloaded.
filename

A string indicating the name that the CSV file should be should be saved to.

Warning

Files located on the H2O server may be very large! Make sure you have enough hard drive space to accomodate the entire file.

Examples

library(h2o)
h2o.init()
#> Reading in config file: ./../../../../.h2oconfig
#> 
#> H2O is not running yet, starting it now...
#> Warning: cannot open file '/Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o/branch.txt': No such file or directory
#> Error in file(con, "r"): cannot open the connection
irisPath <- system.file("extdata", "iris_wheader.csv", package = "h2o")
iris.hex <- h2o.uploadFile(path = irisPath)
#> Error in h2o.getConnection(): No active connection to an H2O cluster. Did you run `h2o.init()` ?

myFile <- paste(getwd(), "my_iris_file.csv", sep = .Platform$file.sep)
h2o.downloadCSV(iris.hex, myFile)
#> Error in is.H2OFrame(data): object 'iris.hex' not found
file.info(myFile)
#>                                                                              size
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv   NA
#>                                                                              isdir
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv    NA
#>                                                                              mode
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv <NA>
#>                                                                              mtime
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv  <NA>
#>                                                                              ctime
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv  <NA>
#>                                                                              atime
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv  <NA>
#>                                                                              uid
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv  NA
#>                                                                              gid
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv  NA
#>                                                                              uname

#>                                                                              grname
#> /Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv   <NA>
file.remove(myFile)
#> Warning: cannot remove file '/Users/terrytangyuan/h2o-3/h2o-r/h2o-package/docs/reference/my_iris_file.csv', reason 'No such file or directory'
#> [1] FALSE
